items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users
Recommendations update in real-time based on recent user activity
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
non_functional: System supports up to 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation
AI model retrains weekly to maintain accuracy

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user account system. No details provided on existing infrastructure or AI capabilities.
